info.name: Testing-intervals-singleShift-summaryReport
info.description:
## Documentation for used collection and data file # Collection This collection is for single-shift test cases which are included in this [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IEwWfIIY2fx70rCU50k8Vftt5AlELAm2q2rf7WqQe8c/edit?gid=1203718845#gid=1203718845) and they are: - TC-00001 - TC-00002 - TC-00005 - TC-00006 - TC-00007 - TC-00008 - TC-00009 - TC-00010 - TC-00011 - TC-00016 - TC-00017 - TC-00018 - TC-00019 - TC-00020 - TC-00021 - TC-00022 - TC-00023 - TC-00024 - TC-00025 Colletion include the following requests: Login Web Account Admin & Verification code Both requests are responsible for login and authenticate user Edit checkIn & Edit checkout Both requests are responsible for use checkin & checkout Summary-Report
Responsible for generating report And all test-scripts are included in this request # Data file "intervalSingleShiftSummaryReport.csv" File include 25 rows each row represent a test case with it's validations. File is used to provide data to collection variables. ### File structure | **column name** | **reflected value in data file** | **reflected value in data base** | | --- | --- | --- | | skipCheckout | Flag used to skip request in specific test cases | None | | TCsId | Test case number which is match the test case number in the used sheet | None | | userId | User that will be used when run test case | UserId | | SessionCheckInId | Session id generated when user create a checkin action | sessionId | | TransactionCheckinID | Transaction id generated when user create a checkin action | transactionId | | SessionCheckOutId | Session id generated when user create a checkout action | sessionId | | TransactionCheckOutID | Transaction id generated when user create a checkout action | transactionId | | CheckIn | Date and time for checkin which is provided by user | createDate | | CheckOut | Date and time for checkout which is provided by user | createDate | | ReportFrom | Start date for generated reportat | FromDate | | ReportTo | End date for generated reportat | ToDate | | SessionTotalActualHoursWork | ساعات الدوام الفعلي | SessionTotalActualHoursWork | | SessionTotalShortesHours | النقص في الدوام | SessionTotalShortesHours | | SessionTotalCheckInExtraHours | حضور مبكر | SessionTotalCheckInExtraHours | | SessionTotalCheckInLateHours | حضور متأخر | SessionTotalCheckInLateHours | | SessionTotalCheckOutLateHours | إنصراف مبكر | SessionTotalCheckOutLateHours | | SessionTotalOverTimeHours | العمل الإضافي | SessionTotalOverTimeHours | | SessionTotalLeaveHours | المغادرات | SessionTotalLeaveHours | | OutNextDay | Boolean flag used check if this shift extend to next day or not | OutNextDay | | Status | حالة التحضير | Status | | TypeDesc | Status description if exist (in case there is "more" link displayed) | TypeDesc |

exec: // Retrieve the collection name from the collection variable
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total Actual Hours Work is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalActualHoursWork,`Expected session total actual hours work to be ${expectedSessionTotalActualHoursWork}, but got ${actualSessionTotalActualHoursWork}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalActualHoursWork);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total Shortes Hours is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalShortesHours,`Expected session total shortes hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalShortesHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalShortesHours}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalShortesHours);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total CheckIn Extra Hours is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalCheckInExtraHours,`Expected session total checkIn extra hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalCheckInExtraHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalCheckInExtraHours}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalCheckInExtraHours);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total CheckIn Late Hours is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalCheckInLateHours,`Expected session total checkIn late hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalCheckInLateHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalCheckInLateHours}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalCheckInLateHours);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total CheckOut Late Hours is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalCheckOutLateHours,`Expected session total checkOut late hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalCheckOutLateHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalCheckOutLateHours}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalCheckOutLateHours);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+":  Validate that Session Total Overtime Hours is correct", function () {

pm.expect(actualSessionTotalOverTimeHours,`Expected session total overTime hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalOverTimeHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalOverTimeHours}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalOverTimeHours);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+": Validate that Leave hours is correct", function () {
pm.expect(actualSessionTotalLeaveHours,`Expected leave hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalLeaveHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalLeaveHours}`).to.equal(expectedSessionTotalLeaveHours);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+": Validate that OutNextDate flag is correct", function () {
pm.expect(actualOutNextDay,`Expected leave hours to be ${expectedSessionTotalLeaveHours}, but got ${actualSessionTotalLeaveHours}`).to.equal(expectedOutNextDay);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+": Validate that status is correct", function () {
pm.expect(actualStatus,`Expected status to be ${expectedStatus}, but got ${actualStatus}`).to.equal(expectedStatus);
pm.test(collectionName + "/" + folderName +"/"+TestCaseId+": Validate that Type Desc is correct", function () {
pm.expect(actualTypeDesc,`Expected type desc to be ${expectedTypeDesc}, but got ${actualTypeDesc}`).to.equal(expectedTypeDesc);
